catalogue_raissonne: Delteil ii with letters, Daumier Project 2705
creditline: Gift of A. M. French in honor of Dr. Robert H. Getscher
description: five tall, thin men in black suits in a mock funeral procession, with heads bowed; man at right has a walking stick; man at center carries an urn partially covered by a black cloth
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in the image: [763]; URC, printed: [2.]; LRC, in black: illegible number; LRC, in black: partially illegible inscription--[Destouches]; LLC, below image, printed: [Mon martinet, 116 r. Rivoli et 41, r. Vivienne.]; LRC, below image, printed: [Lith Destouches, 28, r. Paradis Pre Paris]
provenance:
Adrienne M. French, Fairlawn, OH

Henri M. Petiet, Paris, not in Lugt, cm verso (from mat)
signed: LLC, in the image: [h.D.]; top center, printed: [CROQUIS PARISIENS.]; bottom center, printed: [LES GARÇONS EN HABIT NOIR. / Enterrement du tronc des pour-boire.]
title: Les garçon en habit noir (The Waiters in Black Suits), from "Croquis Parisiens"
